reviewText: This film lacks a LOT of the book. It is only an hour and a half long so they have had to rush through a lot of details. There is a little bit of language, drug use and a bedroom scene. I wouldn't say this movie is for the whole family. If you are just looking for a little entertainment then this movie is for you.
